body_html: I don't think we will ever want to add this functionality. It's not always the case that you actually want the list to get sliced (what if one of the arguments to your network is a list of ops it is supposed to perform?). Since there's no reasonable default I think we will just stick the the current behavior.

body: I don't think we will ever want to add this functionality. It's not always the case that you actually want the list to get sliced (what if one of the arguments to your network is a list of ops it is supposed to perform?). Since there's no reasonable default I think we will just stick the the current behavior.
